title: Torch can not run  in Pycharm but it work in cmd
body_html:
I installed torch on windows 10 but meet some problem
import torch; import sys; print('Python %s on %s' % (sys.version, sys.platform)) torch.cuda.is_available()
can not run in Pycharm but it work in cmd


System Info

  • PyTorch or Caffe2:PyTorch
  • How you installed PyTorch ( pip): pip
  • Build command you used (if compiling from source):
  • OS:windows 10
  • PyTorch version:0.40
  • Python version:3.6.4
  • CUDA/cuDNN version:9.0

body:
I installed torch on windows 10 but  meet some problem 
`import torch;
import sys;
print('Python %s on %s' % (sys.version, sys.platform))
torch.cuda.is_available()`
can not run  in Pycharm but it work in cmd

![2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18575285/40058306-5ee5736e-5883-11e8-94be-bce6899ff6b1.png)
![3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18575285/40058308-5f2e1862-5883-11e8-9b63-45b1d05c9281.png)

![1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18575285/40058305-5e996938-5883-11e8-8c2e-c7bddff58639.png)


## System Info

- PyTorch or Caffe2:PyTorch
- How you installed PyTorch ( pip): pip
- Build command you used (if compiling from source):
- OS:windows 10 
- PyTorch version:0.40
- Python version:3.6.4
- CUDA/cuDNN version:9.0
